review: We bought this for our Smart TV which is actually a Dumb TV and would so often not be able to access TV shows on Netflix or Amazon prime saying "this video is unavailable." I'd read this device is has much stronger connection than other devices. And they were right. Using this through the HDMI instead of using the Smart TV's software... it never has trouble with internet or finding an episode available. It loads apps way faster. Works just as good as our ROKU on the other TV but was a whole lot cheaper than what we paid at the time for ROKU.  And we love that it has PBS for Downton Abbey. Plus, it's small enough to travel with. We used it at our family's house during the holidays on their TV.Highly recommend.

review: The Fire TV Stick is great but it still lacks a bit in the Plex department.  I often have to run it at a lower resolution but I know it is because it is using the built in software to run as opposed to the PC that the content is located.  Other than the Plex issue the Fire Stick has been great and has replaced our Chromecast because of the interface.
